=====================================

### Government of Canada Tender Announcement

#### Title
T7054-220044A - Janitorial Services for Penticton Airport Facility

#### Tender Information

* **Reference Number:** WS4276143892
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4276143892-Doc4276171545
* **Amendment Number:** 0
* **Publication Date:** October 25, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 17, 2023 (14:00:00 PM)
* **Amendment Date:** October 25, 2023

#### Tender Description
Transport Canada requires janitorial cleaning services at the Penticton Airport, located at 3000 Airport Road, Penticton, British Columbia. The contract will have a one-year duration with an option to extend for four additional one-year periods. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing all labour, supervision, materials, equipment, and transportation necessary to accomplish the janitorial cleaning services.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation criteria will be based on a combination of technical merit and price.

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement

#### Geographical Scope
The tender requires the provision of services in the province of British Columbia, Canada.

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Janie Leung, SPAC/PSPC
* **Contact Email:** [janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone:** Not Provided

#### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17826499?extsite=MTc4MjY0OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Attachments
No attachments are provided with this notice.

**Note:** This tender announcement has expired and is no longer valid for submission of proposals. The provided notice URL will lead to a closed tender. Please refer to the government's procurement website for new tender opportunities.
